body.name: IOWODO Smart Watch for Men Women - 1.85''HD Screen with Make and Answer Calls, with AI Voice Assistant, SpO2/Heart Rate/Sleep Monitor, 100+ Sports Modes, Smartwatch for Android and iOS (2 Straps)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 5 hrs 52 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 13. Order within 5 hrs 52 mins
features: ⌚【1.85'' HD Color Touch Screen and Personalized Style】The fitness smart watch is equipped with a 1.85'' high-resolution HD touch screen, bringing you an unprecedented use experience. This smart watch has more than 100 unique watch faces to choose from. You can also customize your favorite pictures as watch faces on ‘’Da Fit‘’ APP, or customize your favorite wallpapers, giving you a unique experience every time you check the time.

📞【Making/Receiving Calls and Voice Assistant】The smart watch has a built-in speaker and microphone, and after connecting to your phone via Bluetooth, you can activate the AI voice assistant to issue commands. For example, make calls, control music, check the weather, set alarms and timers, etc. When your phone receives a call or message (such as WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, etc.), the smartwatch issues a real-time notification, making you never miss anything and making your life more convenient and better.

🏃【More Than 100 Sports Modes】This fitness watch provides more than 100 sports modes: running, basketball, yoga, cycling, walking, climbing, badminton, tennis, etc. You can also view your complete workout data in the ‘’Da Fit‘’ APP. The watch automatically records your daily steps/calories/exercise distance, etc. As well as a timer, stopwatch, and other functions to help you exercise. You can also set exercise goals (Like almost all non-GPS smartwatches, this watch counts your steps based on your arm movements. So if you move your arms like normal while running, the watch will be more accurate to count your steps.)-NOTE: Not for the sauna, hot water, swimming, or diving.

💓【24/7 Health Monitoring】The fitness pedometer watch is equipped with a motion sensor that can automatically monitor dynamic heart rate in real-time 24/7, It can also track personal sleep and detect blood oxygen saturation and stress to adjust the personal physical condition. Offer a detailed sleep quality analysis report (light sleep/deep sleep/awake stage) through the App, helping you adjust your lifestyle and healthier. This smartwatch also helps women track their menstrual cycles.[NOTE: This watch can't be used as a medical diagnostic tool.]

👍【More Features, More Fun】The men women's smart watches also have other useful daily functions, such as smart notifications, music control, camera control, casual games, weather forecast, sedentary reminder, alarm clock, stopwatch, timer, etc., and wait for you to dig. The step counter watch is compatible with Most Android 6.0 and iOS 9.0 or above smartphones. Built-in large capacity battery - 300mAh, up to 5 days of use and approximately 30 days of standby with just 2 hours of charging.

⚠【Note】① Since the watch is equipped with speakers and microphones, it is not waterproof. The smart watch fully meets daily dustproof needs such as hand washing and sweating, but it is not recommended that you take the watch to swim or dive. ② We provide a long after-sales period and very complete customer service, if you need help when using the watch, please write to us, and we will reply to every email and help customers solve all problems quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Thrilled with my stylish and comfortable smartwatch – the best purchase. The magnetic charging cord simplifies and provides five days of use with a two-hour charge. Customizable features include home screens, weather updates, heart rate monitoring, blood pressure monitoring, step counting, blood oxygen detection, and time/date display. The "GloryFit" app makes setup easy. Waterproof with two strap options, it offers automatic display lighting and app connectivity for alerts. It competes with pricier brands at an exceptional price/performance ratio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Everything works brilliantly, great smartwatch!This smartwatch has useful features that have helped me track my fitness. It has a good and many selection of watch faces.It shows the daily steps you've walked and the calories you've burned. I have found the steps monitor pretty accurate. It matched almost exactly what my treadmill said! It has been easy to set up and pair with my smartphone and I’m pleasantly surprised that the Battery life can reach a week or more!It connects to your phone via Bluetooth and notifications show on the screen. It has a built-in speaker and mic so you can use it for phone calls. Being able to answer the phone or make phone calls when my phone isn’t close by is such a great convenience.I will continue to watch the sleep monitor and stress monitor with interest as I haven’t had these features previously! Overall it is an excellent watch, crammed with features, and very comfortable to wear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I'm thrilled with my chic and cosy smartwatch; it's the best investment. With just two hours of charging time, the magnetic charging cord simplifies and offers five days of use. Home screens, weather updates, blood pressure, heart rate, step tracking, blood oxygen detection, and time/date display are among the functions that may be customised. Setting up is simple using the "DaFit" app. It has two strap options, is waterproof, and has smartphone connectivity for notifications in addition to automatic display lighting. With an amazing price/performance ratio, it rivals more expensive ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST budget smartwatch you can have
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Impressed with my sleek and comfy smartwatch – an excellent buy. The magnetic charging cable simplifies things, providing a five-day usage on a two-hour charge. It boasts customizable features like home screens, weather updates, heart rate monitoring, blood pressure tracking, step counting, blood oxygen detection, and time/date display. Setting up is a breeze with the "DaFit" app. With two strap options, water resistance, automatic display lighting, and app connectivity for alerts, it competes admirably with pricier brands, offering an outstanding price/performance ratio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive watch in reasonable price!!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this smartwatch and I'm thoroughly impressed! The sleek design and comfortable fit make it a stylish accessory for any outfit. The touchscreen display is responsive and easy to navigate, and I love being able to receive notifications and control my music playlists right from my wrist.the battery life is impressive - I highly recommend this smartwatch to anyone looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Versatile and Functional Smartwatch that Meets Expectations
reviews.reviewText: The product comes in a small box that contains the smartwatch, two straps, a magnetic USB cable for charging, and Instructions in multiple languages. A quality watch that connects to your phone via a "Da Fit" app. The 1.85-inch screen size. it can make calls directly from the smart watch, This watch is also a good choice for fitness smart watches. It has more than 100 sports modes and will automatically record your daily steps/calories/sports distance etc. It is a solid choice for those looking for a versatile smartwatch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A feature packed watch with excellent value
reviews.reviewText: The watch has a really good battery life and it came with an extra band. The most important feature is that you can answer calls using the watch. It measures heart rate, oxygen level, etc., including stress level. It can track your sleep, as well as control the camera shutter and music. It’s well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up. Nice look . Reasonable price .

Compré hace poco un IOWODO R30pro para un familiar y lo lleva desde entonces. Le ha dejado sorprendido por que tiene muchas aplicaciones deportivas para el seguimiento. Tiene muy buena relación calidad-precio, por lo que es un buen reloj. Para temas de salud es perfecto. La opción de llamada funciona muy bien, se oye perfectamente sin tener que acercarlo y se sincroniza muy fácilmente con todos los contactos, lo que permite llamar sin marcar. Los mensajes se reciben tambien correctamente. Ya me ha pedido que le compre otro para su mujer y otro para regalar a su sobrino de 17 años, que lo ha visto y se ha encaprichado. Facil manejo y puesta a punto con la aplicacion DA FIT. La bateria dura toda la semana sin necesidad de nueva carga. Recomendable 100%

reviews.reviewTitle: Tolle Uhr zu einem fairen Preis
reviews.reviewText: Ich habe lange nach einem Fitness-Tracker gesucht und bin schließlich auf diese Uhr gestoßen. Die Bestellung und die Lieferung waren unkompliziert. Die Uhr wird zusammen mit einem Ersatz-Armband und einem Ladekabel geliefert. Die Uhr macht direkt auf den 1. Blick einen sehr wertigen Eindruck. Das Display ist sehr hell und auch bei Sonnenlicht gut zu erkennen. Die Menüführung ist selbsterklärend und ohne Anleitung gut verständlich. Die Uhr hat viele Funktionen und funktioniert sehr gut. Im Vergleich zu der um mehr als 100 Euro teureren Samsung-Smartwatch meiner Frau steht diese Uhr in nichts nach. Also für den Preise eine sehr gute Uhr. Klare Kaufempfehlung.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Fantastische smart watch voor deze prijs!
reviews.reviewText: Woow wat een leuk horloge. Goede app, horloge meet o.a. hartslag, slaap en zuurstofgehalte. Interface is behoorlijk snel. Digital Crown werking is een aandachtspuntje. Niet twijfelen maar kopen!

L'orologio viene consegnato in una semplice confezione, che comprende un altro cinturino, diverso da quello già montato, cavo per la ricarica magnetica e istruzioni anche in italiano. Si presenta molto bene, ottimo materiale, tante funzioni precise, anche la funzione sveglia o modalità gioco per un ottimo passatempo, ha una facile connessione con il cellulare.Facile lo smontaggio e rimontaggio del cinturino il quale presente una piccola levetta per facilitare l'innesto, inoltre è fatto con materiale che non da assolutamente fastidio al polso. Dotato di piccolo altoparlante dal quale si riceve e trasmette bene la voce. Lo consiglio per il rapporto qualità/prezzo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Good value smart watch with call receiving
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this mainly for the call receiving and answering which is very handy. However the watch has lots of other useful features, like fitness tracking, heart and sleep monitor. It's nice to be able to change the watch face. Very easy to operate and the touch screen works well. Comes with a choice straps, good battery life and good quality feel.
